thread.title: Frank Fabian

author: Frank Fabian
title: Frank Fabian
text: TrustedHousitters.com was an excellent resource for my wife and I to find an opportunity to house sit in the U.S. We were looking to leave the Caribbean, where we live on our catamaran, during the hurricane season, and were so fortunate to have found a wonderful estate home to manage for eleven weeks; during the exact timeframe we desired! The website is very straight-forward, and enables both the prospective sitter and home owner to post information regarding their needs and communicate in a secure and professional manner. I highly recommend this website!
